pullrequest.title: Support more joint types in model editor

content.raw:
I've only been able to make it work by setting a reference body that's not the parent or child link of the joint. So we would not be able to set them as the default reference body. The user would need to insert a third link and set that as the reference body. 

I'll try again and confirm this.
content.html:
I've only been able to make it work by setting a reference body that's not the parent or child link of the joint. So we would not be able to set them as the default reference body. The user would need to insert a third link and set that as the reference body.

I'll try again and confirm this.
